section.heading: Acceptance of subchapter — Procedure; vote required for approval; adoption by board of directors.

annoGroup.heading: Temporary Amendment of Section
annoGroup.annotation: For temporary (225 day) amendment of section, see § 3(b) of the Cooperative Association Temporary Amendment Act of 1996 (D.C. Law 11-265, April 25, 1997, law notification 43 DCR 4355).

annoGroup.heading: Emergency Legislation
annoGroup.annotation: For temporary amendment of section, see § 3(b) of the Cooperative Association Emergency Amendment Act of 1996 (D.C. Act 11-483, January 13, 1997, 44 DCR 626), § 3(b) of the Cooperative Association Legislative Review Emergency Amendment Act of 1997 (D.C. Act 12-59, March 31, 1997, 44 DCR 2235), and § 3 of the Cooperative Association Second Emergency Amendment Act of 1997 (D.C. 12-203, December 2, 1997, 44 DCR 7498).
